言わずと知れたFPSの代名詞ともいえる作品。
当時としてはグラフィック、エンジンともに非常に優秀で特に物理エンジンは画期的だった。
重力など物理計算がリアルになっており、例えば水中に空のドラム管を投げ込むと浮力によって浮く。
それにより橋を持ち上げて通る、といったパズルもある。
また、HL2(Source)はMODが非常に多く、優れた作品も多い。
人によってはMODだけで数年遊べるかも知れない。
Sourceエンジンのゲームを持っていないなら最低一つは買っておこう。
Игра - ЛЕГЕНДА! Этим всё сказано.
un classico che non deve mancare a nessuno

Nonostante l'età, Half-life 2 si rivela veramente un gran gioco con una trama ben congegnata ed un solido percorso giocabile molto molto vario e per nulla ripetitivo. Il motore grafico, ovviamente non più al passo con i tempi, offre però effetti molto particolari come quelli legati alla fisica, che non si ritrovano in molti giochi più moderni. In una parola consigliatissimo ma credo che non ci sia nessuno che già non l'abbia. Vabbè almeno questa "rece" mi farà ottenere l'achiev di steam !
Шедевр!впрочем, как и вся серия  half-life
Because ? BEST. GAME. EVER. NUMBER TWO

вполне хорошая стрелялка на прохождение, особено в 2004 было супер. довольно длиная, местами накатывает уныние изза почти отсутствия мобов и екшена, боезапас совсем мелкий и быстро заканчивается, автомат просто щекоталка, враги не реагируют на попадания хоть в упор с дробава стоят и палят дальше, даже улицы в псевдогороде линейнокоридорные, свободы никакой. но раз пройти точно стоит, тыкая постояно ф6 ф9

Лучшее , что созданно на данный момент в игровом мире . Прошел игру в 5 ый раз , а эмоции и атмосфера сохраняются точно такие же , словно играю впервые . Half-Life обладает невероятно загадочным сюжетом , который иногда просто будоражит догадками .  P.S. "Кто же все таки этот человек в синем костюме (Gman) ? "  Одно известно - истина где-то рядом )

There is no way words can describe this game - it is beautifully crafted, meticulously planned out, incredibly fun and most of all, timeless. Nothing will ever come close to the form and function of this game, and despite the current absence of a sequel, this is as close to perfection as gaming will ever get.

A classically tooled, second installment of the much praised Half-Life series. With the implimentation of even more advanced mechanics, such as a simulated physics engine, sharp gfx, and tight controls. This game pick up where HL left off. Valvue continues to show master of both design and story telling elements, re-useing the in-game (cut-sceneless) story telling that made them the multi-million dollar company they are today. Must play for fans of, FPS, HL, or Valve.

아 재밌는데 람다추적자 어떻게 깨지 고민 중
도전과제가 너무 어려븜

Mix a good sci-fi story with Valve's knack for character personalities and Source's mod compatability, and a pretty long single player mode (the multiplayer is separate, another $5), and this is definitely worth it. The graphics are a bit dated, yes, but there's HD mods for that. 

The Source engine uses Havok physics - that fancy physics engine in the Force Unleashed reviews? Except it's the Source engine, and it's not some crappy console port. They really take advantage of the physics - the gravity gun and a set of physics puzzles show off what the engine can do. If you're gaming on a serious budget, I'd definitely look into Half Life 2 and its Deathmatch counterpart. Not for the faint of heart, though; watch for one level's spooky and shocking atmosphere. But it's just one level, and it's not as intense as Bioshock. Oh, and there's gore: some zombie organs and exploding bugs.

Half-Life 2 took the world by storm, and is still immensely enjoyable to replay today. Valve's level design has stood the test of time, and the voice acting and facial animation is still putting games to shame five years on.
Un capolavoro firmato Valve, da avere e da giocare dall' inizio alla fine, comprese le postume espansioni.
Amazing game that everyone should play it.

Só eu não achei nada de mais nesse jogo? O universo do jogo é bem rico, mas não é explorado o suficiente. Os produtores parecem sádicos que querem que tu fique na vontade. O jogo tem boas partes marcantes e perseguições emocionantes, podendo citar o início, a parte do hovercraft, Ravenholm, a parte do jipe, a parte final... mas em contraste tem longos períodos de marasmo e o personagem que é um quase Messias, é na real um pau mandado, muito semelhante ao Harry Potter, todos conhecem, é o salvador e tal, mas sem os outros ele não faz nada. Tecnicamente os gráficos e som são legais, a jogabilidade é como a da maioria dos FPS (FPS de labirinto), a gravity gun que dá uma inovada, e a dificuldade é baixa no nível médio. Talvez no hard tenha algum desafio. A duração é alta, aliás, devido às partes de marasmo citadas, ele parece longo demais até. Talvez eu tenha jogado esse jogo tarde demais e depois de outros jogos que tenham feito coisa melhor em cima de mecânicas criadas nele, mas assim como Bioshock, não vi a obra prima que todos acham.

NOTA: 7.5/10
Without a doubt one of the best storylines a game has to offer. If your into outstanding singleplayer or multiplayer, this is a must buy 10/10.

Half Life 2 é a melhor série de FPS já feita. Ainda que seja antiga, os gráficos são bons, e, à exceção de Portal (que tb é da Valve e se conecta ao enredo de Half Life), creio não ter nenhum FPS com um enredo e jogabilidade tão bons. O elenco da série cativa duma forma que faz você realmente se importar com cada um deles e sofrer com cada acontecimento. Half Life 2 é um marco na história dos games, um dos melhores jogos que você poderá jogar, e se você ainda não se deu a série de presente, também é um tremendo tanga frouxa. E ponto final.
This is basically the best game ive ever played in my life-time, if u don't have this game, then   you are missing out on something really epic!. 10/10
One of the most solid FPS games I've ever played. The story is interesting, the gunplay is challenging but not overly-so, and the gravity gun is a blast to play with.
in my opinion, this is the greatest PC game ever made. nothing has come close.

Bought HL:2 during the Fall sale, and have enjoyed every moment. I especially like the little puzzles included in the game, like placing cinder blocks on a ramp to make it rise up, or knocking over a washing machine into a basket to raise a ramp. Great gameplay, great character scripts, and zombies. You can't go wrong with zombies.
1999년의 혁명을 더 발전된 소재로 다시 혁명을 일으켰다.

Why haven't you even played this game yet?

Alright here's the basics:

- Fantastic atmosphere
- Relies on its environment to tells its story, not on exposition
- Excellent designed levels
- Great uninterrupted set-pieces, what I mean is no "hey! we are going to force you looking at this failing building so you have an experience the way we want it!"
- linear game, but it never fells like one (and exploration is rewarding)
- variety of enemies and locales
- fun weapons
- well optimized, low system requirements!
- and more!

Word of advice, play this game when you have nothing else worrying your mind, get some proper sound and you'll have a blast.
Absolutely amazing.

A truly amazing singleplayer shooter experience. Deeper and more engaging than any other campaigns in the fps shooters, and very fun to boot. The physics is great, the gameplay is fun, the enemies are smart, the storyline fascinating, and your companions memorable. Fully deserves its amazing metascore.
One of the best games I have ever played.
